name: @ai-stats/java-sdk
description: AI Stats Java SDK (preview) - generated client with models wrapper

scripts.smoke:chat: dotenv -e .env.local -- cmd /c "javac -d tests/out src/gen/*.java tests/SmokeChat.java && java -cp tests/out SmokeChat"
scripts.smoke:responses: dotenv -e .env.local -- cmd /c "javac -d tests/out src/gen/*.java tests/SmokeResponses.java && java -cp tests/out SmokeResponses"
